nodes.text: Errant Trader was an Ithorian Herdship.
Errant Trader was similar to almost every other Ithorian Herdship, being a huge flattened ball which was designed to simulate the jungles of Ithor, the Ithorian homeworld, in a space-worthy vessel.
Errant Trader kept a regular schedule through the busy systems of the Core Worlds and Colonies, notably Brentaal, Kuat, Corellia, and Commenor.
